trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Tecuziztecatl can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Glowing
entries: Tecuziztecatl sheds dim light within 20 feet of itself.

trait.name: Flexible
entries: Tecuziztecatl can enter a space large enough for a Medium creature without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Tecuziztecatl can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Spit Acid {@recharge 4}
entries: Tecuziztecatl exhales acid in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
